title: i need this type of background for use please help me...
content:
i need this type of background for use....please help me...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bg quest.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720011030/http:/typophile.com/files/bg%20quest.jpg) | 81.5 KB |
author: suresh2207

comments.content: What do you mean? A drawing of a ticket? A mottled green background?

Here, I created this pattern swatch for ya...

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720011030im_/http:/www.graphicdeclaration.com/images/patternswatch_mottled.jpg)

I used a free texture source file from [BittBox](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720011030/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/36238268@N03/8515391170/in/set-72157632879691558) to create the mottled texture like in your sample.

I imagine there's a filter for mottle pattersn in Ps (and perhaps Illy too), but hey ...

Hope that helps.
